name: Unlock the Pause Button
description:
A small shooter game made for Secret Santa Jam

The web version is kinda blurry so I highly recommend downloading the game instead of playing on your browser. 

How to play
  • W A S D for movement
  • Left-click to shoot, Q to change weapon
  • Spacebar to use skill, E to change skill
  • After finishing a wave, you can choose an upgrade and an obstacle. These obstacles will make the game more interesting and challenging

If there's any bugs, please drop a comment. I would be more than happy to read your feedback!
